lead_paragraph: Philippe Coutinho grabbed a hat-trick as Brazil ramped up their Copa America campaign with a resounding 7-1 win over a hapless Haiti on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Hammer Hapless Haiti 7-1 in Copa America Massacre
headline.main: Brazil Hammer Hapless Haiti 7-1 in Copa America Massacre
